greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Semiprimes in fourth spoke of a hexagonal spiral (A056108).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: {a(n)} = {3*n^2 + n + 1 iff semiprime}. {a(n)} = A056108 INTERSECT A001358.
example: A056108(1) = 5 is not in the sequence, as it is a prime.
A056108(5) = 81 = 3^4 is not in the sequence, as it is a 4-almost prime.
xref: Semiprimes in other spokes: A113519, A113524, A113525, A113528, A113530.
results.author: _Jonathan Vos Post_, Jan 12 2006
